page.title: 15RELIGION
page.content: {5 churches}in area,{mainly Christian.} {All Saints C.o.E (1325)}- Restored 1873, 1959. Burial Ground. No hall, activities elsewhere. 2 ministers.Sunday attendance increased with population. {St. Stephen's (1955)}- Evangelical, Anglican. Church/church hall. Sunday attendance fluctuates. Increase in young members. 1 minister. {Union Church (1913)}- Non-conformist Christian. Extended 1938,52,63. 4 halls. 50 activities/week. 1 minister. {Free-Church (1850)}- Christian open to all denominations. Buildings since altered. 2 halls + 2 classrooms. 1 minister. Sunday attendance increased. {Society of Friends or Quakers (1955)}- meeting house in Shenfield. Wide range of beliefs practised. Extended 1960. Meeting room + 3 ancillary rooms. No permanent minister. Stable attendance.
